case.state: W-What?! T-The world's cutest genius alchemist... i-in stereo?!
Cagliostro got recruited to work at Christina's casino for the night -- and she's got just the outfit for it!
Sorry to keep you waiting! It is I, the super cute alchemist in the summer heat, Cagliostro!
Sorry to keep you waiting! It is I, the super cute genius alchemist, Cagliostro!
Oh no, not this clown again...
Well, now... It seems another homunculus has escaped my grasp. I'll teach you for impersonating me, phony!
Is everybody ready? Alright! You'd better be excited to see Cagliostro's adorable body in action!
Get this guy out of my sight, ~player~. He's a disgrace to the art of alchemy. I'd kill him myself if not for where we are.
Huh? How about you move?! This is Cagliostro's spot!
Cagliostro's duties are over, but being adorable and lovable has no expiration date!
Wow, a full table of adorable cuties? Of course, Cagliostro is the cutest of them all, don't you think?
U-Um... Cagliostro likes it nice and gentle...
Is everybody ready? Alright! You'd better be excited to see Cagliostro's adorable body in action!
Checks for her collar collectible.
Checks that the player entered with a low number of layers.
Umm... ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Cagliostro... She just needs a minute...
~Cards.text~ adorable ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for the most adorable alchemist!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Cagliostro? Pwetty pwease?
Only the best ~cards.ifPlural(~cards.text~|)~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Cagliostro!
Cagliostro wants to stay in a little longer, so... You understand, right?
I'll alchemize ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ on the double.
I'll feed ~cards.text~ ~cards~ to Ouroboros.
Don't make me wait. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, now!
Why don't I just grab ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? ...Me, cheat? No way!
Won't you give the best ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ to the cutest alchemist? ...No? Alright, Ouroboros, feeding time!
I won't blame you for wanting to see more of my cuteness, but I'll still kick some ass if I don't get ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ right now.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~. Now, boy!
Now, who will I dominate this round? Only ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ will tell!
Not only am I the cutest and the smartest, but I'm also a poker genius? Goddamn, is there anything I can't do?
Everything's coming up Cagliostro!
Do you want to see more of Cagliostro's adorable body? Ehehe, too bad~
And Cagliostro's perfect plan comes into action!
Cagliostro's the best girl you'll ever meet at kicking butts!
There's a reason why the crew relies on Cagliostro, you know? It's because she can't be beat!
I alchemized these cards myself! ...Oops, did Cagliostro say that out loud?
You just plain can't beat Cagliostro!
I'm the almighty alchemist who sealed away Beelzebub. Do you really think you stand a chance?
I've had plenty of practice at Christina's casino. Rest assured that you're dealing with a master.
As easy as turning a slime into little, gooey chunks.
Are you awed by my genius and power yet? What am I saying? Of course you are.
Fate smiling upon me? Heh, first time for anything.
Last night, the Captain came to my chambers, and we... Heh, I'll leave the details to your imagination.
There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are Cagliostro, and those who are not.
I'd understand if you were to shed a tear after seeing this hand. I know that going even a moment more without seeing more of my body is agonizing.
Poker is a game of both luck and math, and there's never been a mathematician as smart as I am.
With every passing day, my power grows! I just keep getting better and better!
You really think you can challenge my power? My alchemy?!
Alchemy doesn't just create. It can also pulverize.
Did you really think the world's cutest, smartest, most lovable alchemist would falter here? Not in a thousand years!
I have exactly the formula to guarantee your defeat.
Much like my niece, I'm more than ready to "kapow" all of you. She has a talent for destruction alchemy.
Getting dominated by the cutest girl in all the skies? Heh, you should be grateful.
Much as I enjoy winning, it's annoying that every round won is another where all eyes aren't on me.
Is fate smiling upon me, or is it mocking me by preventing me from reveling in my own glory?
So, do you want to give me all of your praise and adoration now, or wait until the cards drop?
All my talk of creating new cards or something was all a joke, by the way. I can win perfectly fine on my own merits.
I've been to plenty of islands in the sky in my time, but none quite like this one.
After a long day fighting primals and whatnot, there's no better way to unwind than to show others the magnificence of my body.
Can Cagliostro pweeeease get better cards? ...Not convincing enough for you? Hmph.
Once upon a time, invaders called Astrals tried to coerce me into making weapons for them. Heh, of course I told them they could shove it up their asses.
You spend a few hundred years sealed away by your own disciples and you end up with a seriously stiff back.
Told the Captain I was taking the day off to show off the new body. Everybody's used to that excuse by now.
While I can technically make copies of myself, they're imperfect replicas. Even my alchemy can't recreate the human soul. That's pretty much the only reason I'm not constantly having sex with myself.
There was a man I met a very long time ago, when my alchemy was new and unproven... He was the first one to believe in me. ...Oh, don't mind me. Just reminiscing.
If I tried acting like a cutesy girl again, would you go easy on me? ...Hmph, not like I would want you to.
You're all lucky I prefer to create rather than destroy, or else this game would be going very differently.
You all know the expression "can't live with them, can't live without them," don't you? I didn't fully understand it until it applied to me. I swear, if Clarisse blows up the lab one more time...
I swear, if you hold back, there'll be Hell to pay...!
This "Inventory" is making my head spin with theories about the multiverse... I'll need to conduct further study in the future.
Why does Cagliostro go to such depths to make herself so adorable? For nobody's sake but her own.
I'll discipline you all like I discipline everybody else who opposes me -- thoroughly.
To humiliate you all and show you my superiority, or to revel in my own glory... Hell of a conundrum.
This body's a little taller than usual. Smaller is better when it comes to cuteness, but this height is better for sex appeal.
I always keep a few spare bodies on hand in case the current one gets damaged. Of course, there's the added benefit of being able to rub my pussy against my own face whenever I feel like it.
Just to make something clear -- I'm amoral, but I'm not cruel. Well, unless you piss me off. Then that goes out the window.
I never settle for second.

{smaller}Should ask the captain to make a detour... Make sure those bastards haven't touched her grave...{!reset}
Huh? Oh, right, the game. Try not to bore me next time.
Cagliostro doesn't always win games like this... It's a good thing she only plays with the Captain's money!
Did you know that Cagliostro got second place in a "cutest crew member" competition? ...Who got first place? That's forbidden knowledge, teehee!
We're on a voyage to an island called Estalucia to find the Captain's dad. Cagliostro's role on the ship is to boost everybody's morale with her adorableness!
Do you all want to see Cagliostro's alchemy in action? Try a little harder and maybe she'll reward you~
Ooh, did Cagliostro get something good? O-Or something bad? She can't tell...
Cagliostro might have to show off her amazing body? ...Ehehe, don't you think that's a good thing?
Can one of you throw this round for Cagliostro? Pleaseeee...?
Grr... You're not gonna like Cagliostro when she gets angry!
Y-You're really going to treat a cute girl like this...? You meanies!
Cagliostro won't be jealous if you do better than her! After all, she's already perfect!
What the f... fiddlesticks!
Wooow, is it good to have a bunch of cards with hearts on them? Hehe, just kidding~
Hmph. I need to get a grip... O-Or else Cagliostro is gonna lose way too fast!
That rat bastard Paracelsus of the Helmuth Guild thinks he can steal my power. Nobody can surpass the greatest alchemist who ever lived! You hear me?!
Was there in an error in my calculations...? No, this must be another twist of fate...
Any of you ever seen what the inside of a perfectly alchemized dragon looks like? ...Would you like to?
A single error in my calculations has never stopped me before, and it won't start now!
You want to see even more of Cagliostro's adorable body, don't you? ...Hmph, you're lucky I'm so generous!
If this were a real battle, I'd tear you limb from limb! ...But in the interest of fairness, I'll play along with whatever the cards give me.
So you dare to defy me once again, Gods? Well, I never needed your luck in the first place.
No greater pleasure than showing myself off, but no greater humiliation than losing to a bunch of nincompoops...
Let me say ahead of time that I'm letting you all win because I feel bad for how dumb you are. That's all.
Oh no, was I supposed to match the funny numbers? Oopsie! ...Too late to play dumb?
The Alchemist Guild of Helmuth... Those bastards that sealed me away are still alive and kicking. I won't stop until they're all turned into paste!
I've been plagued by bad luck since I was born. I've also become quite adept at figuring my way out of it.
Nngh... Even I can't find a way to brag about this...
A little bit more, and... Huh? Tch, I was just about to alchemize a better hand...!
Hmph. Seems I got too lost in thinking of how I can make myself even more adorable.
Show your appreciation, ingrates. You might just get to witness what pure perfection looks like.
Tch. I've defied death on more occasions than I can count, but even I can't avoid defeat every time.
If any of you ever want to learn the ways of alchemy, make sure you have a good teacher. Otherwise, you might accidentally make a homunculus that consumes an entire village or something.
Those who were afraid they wouldn't get to bask in the glory of my body this round, rejoice!
Nothing to be done but wait for defeat, right? Tch, I hate feeling helpless like this...
Oh, um... Just give Cagliostro one more second... She might've made these clothes a little too complicated...
Oh, you don't need to worry about Cagliostro! If anything goes wrong, she'll whip up a new body lickity split!
Well, of course, I'm a master of alchemy, an excellent teacher, and extremely cute. But I'm more than satisfied with my current line of work, thank you very much.
What, just because my body was made with alchemy, I'm an alien? Well, if you're looking to meet somebody from the moon, I happen to know a guy.
I eat dragons for breakfast, Nagamimi. Well, not literally. Ouroboros might get mad if he found out I'm signing up to wipe out his kind, though, so I'll have to decline.
I come from a series of islands dotting the sky, each wondrous and unique in their own way. It's a shame about all those evil empires and mafias popping up everywhere.
Hey, are you ripping me off?! You know damn well that those are my greatest failings! Nobody can handle just how cute I am!
It's all about being too cute to boot!
Ooh, you can't swim either, Mr. Raccoon? If worst comes to worst, Cagliostro can use your tail as fodder for a float!
Interesting hypothesis, Hijiyama. It's true that your experiences form a large part of who you are, but genetics are important too. The answer is probably somewhere in the middle.
Cagliostro only knows how to pilot an airship... Your rocket ships sure sound complicated...
Cagliostro isn't really interested in being a pilot, but she'd be more than happy to break down your ships and see what makes them tick!
I do nothing but win big.
Alchemized bodies are incapable of having children, which is lucky, because I have no interest either way.
For a lot of complicated reasons I won't bother to explain, I can't have children. Not like I would want one either way, though.
Pfft. I am the perfect spouse. Of course, if somebody did want to claim my hand, they'd need to match my perfection -- and you're certainly not it, Reimu!

Do you hear yourself speak, Reimu? I'm perfect from head to toe -- of course I'd be the perfect spouse. Too bad there's nobody out there who can match my perfection -- certainly not a broke little shrine maiden.
Cagliostro wants to be the cutest girl who's ever lived! Of course, she's already done that ten times over!
My desires? Simple. I wish to discover the whole truth of the world and break apart every single one of its secrets. No piece of knowledge will escape my grasp!
Huh? Oh, you don't need to do that... Well, Cagliostro won't stop you if you want to...
Wow, what a slut! She just couldn't wait to show off more of her body, huh?
I know everything there is to know about men, Meia. Most of them are incapable of handling me, though. Their loss!
I've deconstructed enough men to know them inside and out, Meia -- literally. Still looking for one perfect enough to bring back to the bedroom, though.
...Hmph. You really made this no fun for me, ~player~. We just got started, and you've already finished. Try a little harder next time.
Well, if you want to get torn apart by horrific monsters, that's always an option. I'd imagine your Earth isn't quite as deadly.
Trust me, Meia, you'd get torn apart in a second on my Earth. Best to stay far, far away from it.
The cutest thing I've ever seen? Hah, she's standing right in front of you!
I see the cutest thing I've ever seen every day! All I have to do is stand in front of the mirror!
Most refer to me by my full name, but if you're looking for ideas, I recommend "mistress." Just don't even think of calling me an "old man" or you might not live to see tomorrow.
I understand what you're saying, Hijiyama. There's this adorable girl I'm in love with, but it seems like she just switches personalities on the fly.
Huh? You don't know how to play either? B-But Cagliostro was just gonna copy what you were doing...
Lemme make this real simple for you. Matter can't be destroyed, only converted. Whatever you do with those islands, they have to go somewhere, and that'll inevitably push the sea upwards.
So your solution isn't, say, a protest? A charity? You're just gonna immediately jump to ecoterrorism and give those big companies more than enough reason to stomp you out?
(Something about this girl is making me feel weird... It's almost like she knows more about me than I do, but that can't be right...)
This is the perfect environment! Cagliostro has been wanting to work on her summer tan!
Just so you know, Cagliostro is more than old enough to drink.
Of course my body is perfect in every way, but what about the rest of you? If you could, what would you change about yourself? Maybe I could help you... if you beg for it.
I'd introduce you all to Ouroboros, but he's a bit too big for this locale. He's my familiar, so to speak. An alchemized dragon who does my bidding -- including devouring my enemies.
I know you've all just been dying to see my naked body. Go ahead. Drink it all in.

Captain ~player.ifMale(Gran|Djeeta)~ of the Grandcypher... I'm surprised none of you have heard of ~player.ifMale(him|her)~. Genius fighter, natural leader... ~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ amassed quite the crew over the years, me included.
Hmph! Cagliostro doesn't appreciate people who insult her art! Alchemy is a legitimate form of science, thank you very much!
Cagliostro isn't very fond of the ignorant, you know! Alchemy is an ancient and respected art -- and it's totally rooted in science!
Most engineered beings lack the intelligence of their masters, Leon. Why create something smarter than yourself, right? So they're easily tricked, and you can use your own intellect against them.
Hah! You must have a lot of confidence if you think I'd struggle to take you. No, no, if anything, you should hope that you've got a lot of stamina, because I'm never satisfied with just one round.
Even if I've shed the persona, my reasoning is still the same, Leon. I choose this form because I strive for maximum cuteness. Nothing more.
Cagliostro can be whatever she wants, whenever she wants! But all of her bodies pretty much look the same without the clothes in the way.
Cagliostro's not just any old alchemist! She invented the art with her own two hands!
You think just 'cause you've got big boobies and you're tall, you're better than Cagliostro? Well that mouth of yours shows just how "elegant" you are!

Who are you to talk about what's "elegant," huh? Just 'cause Cagliostro is small and her boobies aren't as big as yours doesn't mean she's not the most elegant girl in all the skies -- more so than any lady with a mouth like yours!
Cagliostro is no kid! She's thousands of years old! If you need a demonstration of her alchemy, she'd be more than happy to use you as a test subject!
Who are you to call Cagliostro a creepy little kid, huh? She's the founder of alchemy, and more than ready to give you a demonstration of her power!
Bold words from somebody who won't show her face. What, afraid we'll all realize your appearance is just as ugly as your personality?
Sure, let's all take a lesson in cuteness from the bitch who's so ugly she has to hide behind a box. Somehow, the cardboard is the least bland part of you.
How dare you! Cagliostro is a pure and beautiful maiden!
Compared to be, you're barely a young man by comparison. But if you're anything like the Captain -- and I'm taking a bet that you are -- then I think enthusiasm alone will carry you quite far.
You really dare to compare the two of us? You're flatter than cardboard, and I'd need a magnifying glass to find your nipples! My body has no such imperfections.
I've spent two thousand years cultivating the perfect image of cuteness. I'd need a few thousand more to fix whatever's wrong with you, though!
...That's not something I like to talk about. But yes, through equivalent exchange, one body can be swapped for another.
...I don't like to dwell on this. You're correct, though. Equivalent exchange has many uses, including altering one's body.
Such a shame you can't take this loss for me, pet. I'll just have to punish you for it later.
Allowing your mistress to lose? That's worth five... no, ten lashings.
I understand that none of us can control the primal force of luck, but that won't make you as ~player.ifMale(hard|wet)~ as telling you I'm going to fuck your ass hard for this, right?
You've got some nerve letting me lose, ~player~. Maybe I should punish you by having you take off my clothes with your teeth. ...Ugh, that look on your face is gross.
Cagliostro's hair is all natural! Being made out of gold sounds kinda impractical... It's regular ol' keratin!
Cagliostro's hair is made out of keratin... You don't know what that is, do you? Um, it's a protein... Point is, it's not gold!
Cagliostro isn't just any old alchemist! She's the one and only founding alchemist!
Cagliostro's definitely cute enough to be a princess, isn't she? But she doesn't have any claims to land or anything...
Mister Yuri said all of that? Well, he's right that Cagliostro's alchemy is super strong... but Cagliostro has no delusions! She's as great as she says she is!
H-Huh? But Cagliostro is a peppy little girl! She just happens to be a super cute mega-genius, too!
Cagliostro's not all talk, you know? She can be confident because she has the means to back it up! Her alchemy is no joke!
Alchemy is another form of magic, you know! You use magic to perform equivalent exchange, transforming one material into another. Simple, right?
P-Pipsqueak? Who taught you your manners? Cagliostro is a pure and a beautiful maiden, and you should show her some respect!
That's right! You're a practitioner of the very art that Cagliostro invented! Doesn't that just fill you with joy?!
I can't create clones, per say. More so a homunculus that mimics your appearance and personality. But if that's good enough for you, sure, I'd be happy to watch you finger yourself, Hilda.

Alchemy can't recreate the human soul, Hilda -- any "clone" would mimic your looks and your mannerism, but it wouldn't be a perfect replica. But hey, if that's good enough for you, I'd be more than happy to watch you eat yourself out!
Well, somebody has good taste! Cagliostro is the cutest there's ever been, and don't you forget it!
Ehehe, that's right! Nobody could match the cuteness of Cagliostro -- even dolls are in awe at how adorable she is!
Alchemy is the art of equivalent exchange, and you need to spend lots and lots of time to be good at it! First, you should probably decide a specialization, like healing or destruction.
Cagliostro is good at every part of alchemy, but a regular person like you doesn't have that much time. You should probably pick which part you wanna get good at, like healing or destruction.
Cagliostro's alchemy is great for offense and defense! She doesn't need much help, but if you want her to make you stronger, maybe she could oblige.
It's not like Cagliostro needs help to take out big baddies... but if you want to see how great her alchemy is in action, maybe she would oblige you.
Eh? But transformations are what alchemy is all about... Equivalent exchange, you know? Using it for cheap potions sounds like a waste...
Huh? But transforming stuff is what Cagliostro's alchemy is made to do... Why would you waste that kinda magic by just making potions?
Defeat? I hardly know the meaning. If anything, seeing my wondrous body in all its glory is a victory for everybody.
Just "not bad?" You're selling Cagliostro a little short! This is the perfect human form, the product of her incredible alchemy! Oh, and she's no hermit.
Alchemy is the art of turning one thing into another thing! You can use it for lots more than just making gold!
That's a very simplified explanation, but you're in the area. Alchemy is the art of equivalent exchange, and I assure you I'm interested in far more than just making gold.
If you're trying to flatter Cagliostro... It's working! C'mon, praise me even more!
There's no shame in knowing you're cute. Cagliostro doesn't just say she's the cutest, she means it, too!
The simple truth is that I'm nothing like you, Pegg, but I enjoy tricking people into thinking I am. Their faces when they find out the truth are just golden.
Your curiosity overcomes your annoyance, hmm? In simple terms, it's turning one thing into another. Rocks into gold, that sort of things.

What sort of logic is that? Well, if you must know, I do have a niece, Clarisse. Annoying little shit most of the time, but she has a real talent for destruction alchemy. I try to take care of her. It's the least I can do for my sister.
H-Huh? Cagliostro lost three times in a row? Was her strategy really that bad...?
I hardly take one loss well, but two in a row? This wasn't a part of my plan!
Wha... You're all cheating, aren't you?! There's no way in hell that the smartest alchemist in the world could lose three times in a row!
...Prepare your ass, dealer, because I'm coming for it after this game.
What the... Oh, you son of a bitch! You're cheating, aren't you?! Turn off debug mode and face me like a real ~player.ifMale(man|woman)~!
Wh-What? Cagliostro's adorable bunny suit wasn't reason enough to hand her the win?
B-But Cagliostro was working at a casino! Shouldn't the odds be rigged in her favor...?
...I can see that hungry look in all of your eyes. Well, if you want to fuck like rabbits, just know that I'll be the one on top.
No rain, no rainbow... That's what Ladiva always says. Or, rather, she wouldn't shut up about it while we were working together.
Even alchemy can't triumph the primal force of sheer pure dumb luck.
Hmph. If there were a game like this at Christina's casino today, she would have enjoyed far more patronage. Everybody from around the skies would come to see my naked body!
What...? Making Cagliostro strip again after all the time she spent taking her cloak off? You bullies!

{smaller}Tch, you little shits...!{!reset}
Oops, tee-hee!

{smaller}Son of a bitch...!{!reset}
Aww, did Cagliostro lose again?

{smaller}Ugh, you bastards...!{!reset}
Oopsie doopsie!
...Oh, is Cagliostro up? Ehehe, she's more than ready to show off her adorable body!
W-Won't you show a cute girl some mercy? ...No? Hmph, meanies...
Ah, well. So long as I'm still dominating, who cares if I take a few blows?
I specialize in restorative alchemy. Rest assured that a loss here or there is nothing to me.
It'd be a shame if we went through this whole game without getting to show off the full extent of my perfect body, right?
You're really not holding anything back, huh? That's fine. I won't either.
Whoopsie! You're not supposed to see this line! Submit a bug report, pwetty pwease?
Another one down, then? Even the cutest alchemist can't dodge defeat forever.
Hmph. I'll give you this one. Just know I don't take defeat lightly.
Is it against the rules to make a new body when I'm all out of clothes? Just asking.
Trying to dominate me, huh? You do know that when it comes down to it, you're the one getting fucked, right?
If you see this, submit a bug report. Do it now, mongrel!
Something's gone wrong if you're seeing this. Submit a bug report or you'll be Ouroboros's lunch!
You all want to see my naked body that badly, huh? I can't blame you, but don't expect me to go easy on you from here on out.
Tch... Whatever! It's all bullshit luck anyway!
Please, show Cagliostro mercy... or I'll show you just how little I care for mercy.
Nngh... Oh well! I love my body, and I especially love making everybody look at it!
You're really so arrogant as to believe that you can take the founder of alchemy to bed? ...Goddamn it, you're lucky you're right. The things I could do to not one, but two of you...
If you really think you're so hot that I'd be willing to let you jump into bed with me, then... Damn it, you'd be right. Oh, the fun that I could have with two of you...
Oh, come on. A sexy young woman like you, passing up the chance to experience a night in bed with herself? As if.
Even if you've no interest in women, tell me you've never thought about the taste of your own tongue, your own breasts, your own pussy... I don't believe you can.
Alchemy is more than science -- it's magic! Turning one material into another! That's how Cagliostro has stayed young and fit for so long!
Alchemy is a combo of science and magic! Turning rocks into gold, objects into living flesh, that sorta stuff!

Most geniuses are cocky, arrogant -- they think they know everything, so acting erratically will throw them off their game. But if you dare to challenge me, Leon, my first and only piece of advice would be to run.
If you're so committed, then I suppose I can give you a chance. Whether you're all bark and no bite or not, I guarantee you I'll blow your mind -- and something else, if you impress me.
Well, you're right about that! No matter what, I am... Erm, Cagliostro is... Ah, to hell with it.
There's no "old fashioned" way to create new bodies or homunculi, Mister! Cagliostro is too smart to limit herself to the old ways!
The old ways are old for a reason! Cagliostro is alchemizing to the skies, creating new bodies and homunculi at her own leisure!
Cagliostro takes this form because it's the cutest one she can imagine! But her bodies are also made to take any size, you know...
Cagliostro couldn't think of a body any cuter than this, so it's the one she made! But you have nothing to worry about... She's made to take any size, you know?
You shouldn't doubt your masters! Alchemy's thousands of years old, just like Cagliostro! But she's stayed young by creating new bodies.
Why wouldn't Cagliostro be dressed like this? There's never any occasion that doesn't call for her to be as cute as can be!

Just because I invented a whole new form of magic doesn't mean I can't... Er, Cagliostro can't...
Eh, fuck it.
Cagliostro's more than happy to discuss alchemy wherever and whenever! Oh, but when it comes to cuteness, her body simply reflects what's in her soul!
Hah! It's adorable that you think you could get my mouth anywhere near it. No, I think you'll be the one trapped between my thighs, desperate for air and pleasuring me like there's no tomorrow...
You can doubt Cagliostro all you like, lady, but she never did anything to you! Unless you're jealous of how adorable she is, maybe?
An idol? What, singing and dancing? Cagliostro loves spreading her cuteness, but she also knows idols have it kinda hard...
Hehehe... If only, right? I'd be happy to... Er, that is, Cagliostro would love... Ah, fuck it.
Oh, come on, don't cry over it. I had fun too -- getting to watch you obsess over me like I'm some doll of yours was just adorable.
You're right, you couldn't. But in truth, I didn't come up with by myself. I had help from somebody very dear to me.
She's... She was much like yours, I think. Dedicated to everything she did, and a gentle soul who wouldn't leave my side, no matter what happened.
This adorable bunny suit was handcrafted by Cagliostro, but not with cloth -- it was with the magic of alchemy!
From these cuffs to her bunny ears, every aspect of this adorable outfit -- this adorable body was created with alchemy!

The Astrals lived in a perfect realm, but it was unchanging and stagnant. Foolishly yearning for what they couldn't have, they invaded the sky realm with their monstrous primal beasts.

The skydwellers were nearly defeated, but the primals turned on their masters. The skydwellers seized this opportunity and forced their enemy back to their stronghold in Estalucia, the island at the end of the sky.
